title: Spawn bug
body:
Anyone else had a problem where at the start of a game on blue side after you would click to walk, it would make you walk towards the red side fountain and could only be stopped by flash or movement abilities. If you started on the red side, you would be trapped and couldn't pass the place where the barrier at the start of the game would be, unless you used flash or dashes. This has happened to me three times so far. I am on a mac (don't hate) and i know it has happened to people who are on Windows version aswell.

So whats up with that?
